=======
History
=======

0.1.0 (2018-06-01)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.


0.4.0 (2019-05-22)
------------------
* Something that produces output consistent with Carnall `89 calcs
* Uses sparse matricies to save memory
* Requires Python >=3.5

0.4.0 (2025-05-05)
------------------
* Includes support for nf=13 (Yb3+). Thanks to McCoy Lim.
